topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549fadda636872407b240200#post_549fadda636872407b240200
!http://www.politicalcompass.org/facebook/pcgraphpng.php?ec=4.62&soc=-7.54!

No surprise there.

Here's the second one, which feels more accurate:
!http://www.gotoquiz.com/politics/grid/29x39.gif!

To break down stuff more comprehensively because I do indeed feel a pathological need to justify every single aspect of my personality:

*Foreign Policy:*
On the left side are pacifists and anti-war activists. On the right side are those who want a strong military that intervenes around the world. You scored: -8.9
!http://www.gotoquiz.com/politics/grid/n6.gif!
This is more or less completely accurate. I do not believe that the US should be the world's police, and the same goes for any country really. It is my belief that military action is only justifiable in self defense.

*Culture:*
Where are you in the culture war? On the liberal side, or the conservative side? This scale may apply more to the US than other countries. You scored: -8.19
!http://www.gotoquiz.com/politics/grid/c9.gif!
Again, accurate primarily because I am obsessively in favor of freedom of speech. I do not give a shit if it is inflammatory, offensive or completely awful, I want everyone to be able to say what they want.

Annnnd there is nothing other than that. Pretty sure its just my economic views that put me so far to the right.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.author: 5056c9e87f123b37f6012a34

topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549fcac463687247bda90300#post_549fcac463687247bda90300
My brother is a pilot and he was suppose to fly an airbus from Surabaya to Singapore.
The airbus disappeared mid-flight and was said to have crashed.

I was so scared when my mom told me about this. I didn't show it but I felt like I was going to break. Then, my bro called and said that his flight had been rescheduled. He couldn't call before because he was in another country and there were no bars.

Thank god he's OK.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
